issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: referencing an added file by it's name in a transform script does not work in hive local mode

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

Also, is there a easy way to specify the tests to be run -- equivalent of 
-Dqfile=...

for TestCliDriver

comments.body:
the test and the output are not in sync. it should fail everytime.

fixing as part of  hive-1570 - it's a small change.
